service.label: Sreaming Service
service.tooltip: Service you are streaming on. Used for certain parameters that's platform based like $followage!

imperial.label: Use imperial instead of metric
imperial.tooltip: if checked weather will show in F instead of C

srenabled.label: !sr and !songrequest response
srenabled.tooltip: enable or disable message sent when someone does !sr or !songrequest without any arguments

srmessage.value: {0} in order to request a song you need to add a song/video ID, url or a search term
srmessage.label: !sr and !songrequest response
srmessage.tooltip: Message sent when someone does !sr or !songrequest without any arguments

excluded.label: Excluded from $cranduser
excluded.tooltip: Users to exclude from $cranduser, seperated by comma

ytuser.label: YouTube ID
ytuser.tooltip:
Channel ID used for the YouTube related parameters 
 Press the button below to locate your YouTube Channel ID!

locateytid.label: Locate YouTube ID
locateytid.tooltip: Opens website to locate you YouTube ID

openreadme.label: Open README.txt
openreadme.tooltip: Opens the README.txt for this script

controlc.label: Copy index.html filepath
controlc.tooltip: Copy the filepath for index.html directly to clipboard for easy insertion in your streaming software

openfilesfolder.label: Open Files Folder
openfilesfolder.tooltip: Opens the built in files folder containing all generated textfiles

opensoundsfolder.label: Open Sound Directory
opensoundsfolder.tooltip: Opens the specific folder for this script

ideas.label: Feature Suggestions
ideas.tooltip: Opens https://ideas.streamlabs.com/ in the default browser

sl.label: Streamlabs
sl.tooltip: Opens https://www.streamlabs.com/ in the default browser

helpmessage.label: Date & Time Help
helpmessage.tooltip: Shows all available arguments for the time format

blog.label: Blog
blog.tooltip: Opens https://blog.twitch.tv/ in the default browser

helpcenter.label: Help Center
helpcenter.tooltip: Opens https://help.twitch.tv/ in the default browser

twitteruser.label: Twitter username
twitteruser.tooltip: insert your twitter username to make sure all twitter related api's works as intended!

norts.label: No Retweets
norts.tooltip: if checked the $latesttweet will ignore retweets

tweeturl.label: Include URL to tweet
tweeturl.tooltip: If checked the response will include url to the latest tweet

tweetshort.label: Shorten tweet url
tweetshort.tooltip: If checked the url in the response will be shortened using tinyurl

tweethowlong.label: Time since tweet posted
tweethowlong.tooltip: if checked the response will include time since te tweet was posted

ctt.value: Come join me over at twitch.tv/$mychannel
ctt.label: Current Click to tweet Message
ctt.tooltip: Current message used for the $ctt link!

cttfailed.value: Failed to update click to tweet link!
cttfailed.label: $setctt failed response
cttfailed.tooltip: Message used for when the $setctt fails to update click to tweet link

twitter.label: Open Twitter Page
twitter.tooltip: Opens the Twitterpage for the user set above

setdefaults.label: Restore Default Settings
setdefaults.tooltip: Restores all script settings to the default ones!
